General.Name: Shanghai New World Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai New World Co., Ltd. owns and operates department stores in Shanghai, China. The company sells Chinese herbal medicines, Chinese patent medicines, western medicines, ginseng tonics, nutritional health products, and medical devices. It also operates hotel under the Radson brand. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No. 2-88 Nanjing West Road, Shanghai, China
